about.title: About...
about.me: Hello, this is my first flutter app using Flame 2D engine ! The project was carried out with the aim to learn the flutter basics.

help.title: Help
help.aim: Your objective is to get a maximum of points before dying in deep void.
help.player: This is your character, move him with virtual joystick, up and down and infinitly on horizontal axe.
help.meteor: A meteorite, avoid them to not die !
help.bonus: A shooting star, catch it and get a bonus of 1000 points!
help.sun: A bright sun but beware it attract everything...
